Theme.title: Theme
Theme.description: Represents a theme with customizable text colors and a background image for the lower third.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Theme entity.

titleColor.description: The text color for the title.

subtitleColor.description: The text color for the subtitle.

backgroundColor.description: The background color for the lower third.

backgroundLayer1.description: URL of the background image for the top layer.

backgroundLayer2.description: URL of the background image for the middle layer.

backgroundLayer3.description: URL of the background image for the bottom layer.

LowerThird.title: LowerThird
LowerThird.description: Represents a lower third with a title and subtitle.

ActiveLowerThird.title: ActiveLowerThird
ActiveLowerThird.description: Represents the currently active lower third and its theme.

definition.description: Stores the currently active lower third to be displayed. A single document with a fixed ID like 'main' will be used.

params.name: docId
params.description: The document ID, typically a fixed value like 'main' or 'active'.
